iata:paymentTermIDissuer.description: Indicates the Payment Terms issuer. Ex. UNECE Recommendation 17 Code List.

iata:paymentTermID.description: Indicates the Payment Terms code, e.g. from the UNECE Recommendation 17 Code List

iata:paymentTermAmountPayable.description: Contains the amount to be discounted from the payment value.

iata:paymentTermDueDate.description: Contains the Invoice payment due date. Format: YYYYMMDDTHH:MM:SS

iata:paymentTermDiscountDueDate.description: Contains the date the amount has to paid by in order to receive the discount. (ISO 8601) Format: YYYYMMDDTHH:MM:SS

iata:paymentTermDiscountPercent.description: Contains the percent discounted in the terms of the payment.

iata:paymentTermDiscountAmount.description: Contains the amount to be discounted from the payment value.
